item.title: [scd] Canopy Vista
item.description:
Land — Forest Plains

({T}: Add {G} or {W}.)

Canopy Vista enters the battlefield tapped unless you control two or more basic lands.

item.title: [scd] Camaraderie
item.description:
Sorcery

You gain X life and draw X cards, where X is the number of creatures you control. Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Burnished Hart
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Elk

{3}, Sacrifice Burnished Hart: Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

item.title: [scd] Breath of Malfegor
item.description:
Instant

Breath of Malfegor deals 5 damage to each opponent.

item.title: [scd] Brash Taunter
item.description:
Creature — Goblin

Indestructible

Whenever Brash Taunter is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to target opponent.

{2}{R}, {T}: Brash Taunter fights another target creature.

item.title: [scd] Blossoming Sands
item.description:
Land

Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield tapped.

When Blossoming Sands enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {G} or {W}.

item.title: [scd] Blossoming Defense
item.description:
Instant

Target creature you control gets +2/+2 and gains hexproof until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Bloodgift Demon
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

At the beginning of your upkeep, target player draws a card and loses 1 life.

item.title: [scd] Bloodfell Caves
item.description:
Land

Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield tapped.

When Bloodfell Caves enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [scd] Blasphemous Act
item.description:
Sorcery

This spell costs {1} less to cast for each creature on the battlefield.

Blasphemous Act deals 13 damage to each creature.

item.title: [scd] Bident of Thassa
item.description:
Legendary Enchantment Artifact

Whenever a creature you control deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card.

{1}{U}, {T}: Creatures your opponents control attack this turn if able.

item.title: [scd] Beast Within
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

item.title: [scd] Banishing Light
item.description:
Enchantment

When Banishing Light enters the battlefield, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until Banishing Light leaves the battlefield.

item.title: [scd] Azorius Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{1}, {T}: Add {W}{U}.

item.title: [scd] Aven Gagglemaster
item.description:
Creature — Bird Warrior

Flying

When Aven Gagglemaster enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life for each creature you control with flying.

item.title: [scd] Avacyn's Pilgrim
item.description:
Creature — Human Monk

{T}: Add {W}.

item.title: [scd] Aura Mutation
item.description:
Instant

Destroy target enchantment. Create X 1/1 green Saproling creature tokens, where X is that enchantment's mana value.

item.title: [scd] Atarka Monument
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add {R} or {G}.

{4}{R}{G}: Atarka Monument becomes a 4/4 red and green Dragon artifact creature with flying until end of turn.

item.title: [scd] Army of the Damned
item.description:
Sorcery

Create thirteen tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature tokens.

Flashback {7}{B}{B}{B} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

item.title: [scd] Archon of Redemption
item.description:
Creature — Archon

Flying

Whenever Archon of Redemption or another creature with flying enters the battlefield under your control, you may gain life equal to that creature's power.

item.title: [scd] Archfiend of Depravity
item.description:
Creature — Demon

Flying

At the beginning of each opponent's end step, that player chooses up to two creatures they control, then sacrifices the rest.

item.title: [scd] Arcane Signet
item.description:
Artifact

{T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.

item.title: [scd] Angler Turtle
item.description:
Creature — Turtle

Hexproof

Creatures your opponents control attack each combat if able.

item.title: [scd] Ambition's Cost
item.description:
Sorcery

You draw three cards and you lose 3 life.

item.title: [scd] Akoum Refuge
item.description:
Land

Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield tapped.

When Akoum Refuge enters the battlefield, you gain 1 life.

{T}: Add {B} or {R}.

item.title: [scd] Akoum Hellkite
item.description:
Creature — Dragon

Flying

Landfall — Whenever a land enters the battlefield under your control, Akoum Hellkite deals 1 damage to any target. If that land is a Mountain, Akoum Hellkite deals 2 damage instead.

item.title: [scd] Ajani, Caller of the Pride
item.description:
Legendary Planeswalker — Ajani

+1: Put a +1/+1 counter on up to one target creature.

−3: Target creature gains flying and double strike until end of turn.

−8: Create X 2/2 white Cat creature tokens, where X is your life total.

item.title: [scd] Aetherize
item.description:
Instant

Return all attacking creatures to their owner's hand.

item.title: [scd] Absorb
item.description:
Instant

Counter target spell. You gain 3 life.

item.title: [scd] Abrade
item.description:
Instant

Choose one —

• Abrade deals 3 damage to target creature.

• Destroy target artifact.

item.title: [ybro] Penregon Besieged
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of your end step, choose a creature with the least toughness among creatures your opponents control. It perpetually gets -1/-1.

Whenever your opponents control no creatures, sacrifice Penregon Besieged.

item.title: [ybro] Fallaji Antiquarian
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Haste

When Fallaji Antiquarian enters the battlefield, conjure a duplicate of another target nontoken creature or artifact you control into your graveyard. The duplicate perpetually gains {1}{R}.

item.title: [ybro] Kayla's Kindling
item.description:
Enchantment

When Kayla's Kindling enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target.

At the beginning of your upkeep, draft a card from Kayla's Kindling's spellbook and exile it. Until end of turn, you may cast that card.

item.title: [ybro] Tomakul Phoenix
item.description:
Creature — Phoenix

Flying, haste

When Tomakul Phoenix dies, it perpetually gets +2/+2

At the beginning {X}{R}, where X is Tomakul Phoenix's power. If you do, return it from your graveyard to the battlefield.

item.title: [ybro] Argothian Uprooting
item.description:
Sorcery

Put two +1/+1 counters on each of up to X target lands you control. They each become 0/0 Elemental creatures with reach, haste, and "When this creature leaves the battlefield, conjure a card named Forest onto the battlefield tapped." They're still lands.

item.title: [ybro] Foundry Groundbreaker
item.description:
Creature — Artificer

When Foundry Groundbreaker enters the battlefield, sacrifice a land. Then conjure two cards named Foundry Groundbreaker's onto the battlefield tapped.

item.title: [ybro] Sylvan Smite
item.description:
Instant

Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control if you weren't the starting player. Then that player deals damage equal to its power to target creature you don't control.

item.title: [ybro] Argivian Welcome
item.description:
Instant

Destroy up to one target creature with power 4 or greater.

Choose a nonland card in your hand. It perpetually gains flash.

item.title: [ybro] Crucias, Titan of the Waves
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Pirate

At the beginning of your end step, you may discard a card. If you do, create a Treasure token and choose ambitious or expedient. If you chose ambitious, seek a card with greater mana value than the discarded card. If you chose expedient, seek a card with elsser mana value than the discarded card.

item.title: [ybro] Great Desert Hellion
item.description:
Creature — Hellion

Starting intensity 1

Menace

At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Great Desert Hellion unless you discard a card. If you discard a card this weay, perpetually increase Great Desert Hellion's intensity by 1.

When Great Desert Hellion leaves the battlefield, you may discard your hand. If you do, draw cards equal to Great Desert Hellion's intensity.

item.title: [ybro] Jarsyl, Dark Age Scion
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Wizard

Starting intensity 1

At the beginning of combat on your turn, you may cast a spell with mana value equal to Jarsyl, Dark Age Scion's intensity from your graveyard without paying its mana cost. If you do, perpetually increase Jarsyl's dintensity by 1.

item.title: [ybro] Raddic, Tal Zealot
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Knight

Hexproof from white, hexproof from black

Whenever one or more Knights you control attack, draft a card from Raddic, Tal Zealot's spellbook.

item.title: [ybro] Richlau, Headmaster
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Advisor

At the beginning of your end step, you may pay {1}. When you do, target artifact card in your graveyard perpetually gains "This creature spell costs {1} less to cast." If it's a creature or Vehicle card, it perpetually gets +2/+2. Put it into your library second from the top.

item.title: [ybro] Rusko, Clockmaker
item.description:
Legendary Creature — Human Artificer

When Rusko, Clockmaker enters the battlefield, conjure a card named Midnight Clock onto the battlefield.

Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, put an hour counter on each permanent you control named Midnight Clock. Each opponent loses 1 life and you gain 1 life.

item.title: [ybro] Yotian Courier
item.description:
Creature — Human Artificer

Flying

Whenever Yotian Courier attacks, choose one that wasn't chosen during your last combat —

• Create a tapped Powerstone token.

• Seek an artifact card with mana value equal to the number of Powerstones you control.

item.title: [ybro] By Elspeth's Command
item.description:
Enchantment

At the beginning of combat on your turn, choose one that wasn't chosen during your last combat —

• Up to one target Soldier perpetually gets +1/+1 and gains flying.

• Choose a Soldier card in your hand. It perpetually gets +1/+1 and gains vigilance.

• Create a 1/1 colorless Soldier artifact creature token.

item.title: [ybro] Norn's Disassembly
item.description:
Enchantment

{1}{W}, Sacrifice a historic permanent: Seek a historic card.

item.title: [ybro] Tawnos Endures
item.description:
Instant

Exile target creature. It gains "At the beginning of your upkeep, if this card is exiled, it perpetually gets +1/+1, then you may put it onto the battlefield."

item.title: [ybro] Piece It Together
item.description:
Sorcery

Starting intensity 1

Draw a card. If Piece It Together's intensity is 4, instead take an extra turn after this one.

Perpetually increase Piece It Together's intensity and the intensity of cards named Piece It Together in your graveyard, hand, and library by 1.

item.title: [ybro] Warzone Duplicator
item.description:
Artifact Creature — Construct

Prototype {3}{U} — 3/3

When Warzone Duplicator enters the battlefield, return target creature an opponent controls with power less than Warzone Duplicator's power to its owner's hand. If that creature wasn't a token, conjure a duplicate of it into your hand. It perpetually gains "You may spend this mana as though it were many of any color to cast this card we wish we could read the end of, but it got previewed with a scrollbar on the text which is very cool."
